plot: An exploration of the overlapping worlds of music and faith through the eyes of a choir and its conductor, and the power of music in building a community of faith.
title: Belief
plot_es: An exploration of the overlapping worlds of music and faith through the eyes of a choir and its conductor, and the power of music in building a community of faith.
plot_en: An exploration of the overlapping worlds of music and faith through the eyes of a choir and its conductor, and the power of music in building a community of faith.
